name: Le Meridien Khao Lak Beach & Spa Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We wanted to see how Khao Lak was faring post Tsumani. After much deliberation we chose the Meridien. It epitimises eveything anyone could want in a hotel. We had a Lagoon Villa and it was amazing, the details so well thought out. Near the beach too. Excellent staff who anticipated your wishes. Definitely a chill out zone. About 7km outside the town but we had a hire car so did not feel isolated. Would certainly consider going back.
reviews.title: Fabulous Hotel

aka: Le Meridien Khao Lak Beach Hotel
description: A contemporary Thai-style resort among the exotic fragrant foliage is situated on a 13km pristine beach and near to the untouched rainforests. It is a secluded and yet exciting destination for a family holiday getaway or a romantic honeymoon. 70 minutes from Phuket International Airport. The resort features guestrooms, suites, villas, three swimming pools, six restaurants, a bar with live band, gym, spa, tennis courts and water sports. 20 minutes to an 18-hole golf course.
